submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        
        diff = []
        for x, y in zip(nums, target):
            diff.append(y - x)
        
        index = 0
        n = len(diff)
        res = 0
        print(diff)
        
        while index < n:
            # 记录当前第一个的符号
            # 记录所有相同连续符号的最大值
            flag = diff[index] > 0
            pre = abs(diff[index])
            res += pre
            index += 1
            while index < n and (diff[index] > 0) == flag:
                number = abs(diff[index]) - pre
                pre = abs(diff[index])
                if number > 0:
                    res += number
                index += 1
        
        return res
